title: Implement transcript upload UI
description: Add UI for recording, uploading, and pasting transcripts in Meetings tab. Show upload options when no transcript is present.

title: Fix Cloudflare build errors
description: Resolve ESLint and unused variable errors blocking deployment.

title: Hide empty summary sections in Meetings
description: Only show summary sections if there is real data. Show upload options if no transcript or summary.

title: DocuSign integration research
description: Investigate DocuSign API integration and pricing for e-signature workflows.

title: User Auth (Google OAuth)
description: Implement Google OAuth login and JWT-based authentication (frontend and backend).

title: Meetings List & Details
description: Display meetings grouped by date, with selectable details and tabs for summary, transcript, and notes.

title: Transcript Upload/Recording Backend Endpoints
description: Implement backend endpoints for uploading, recording, and pasting transcripts.

title: AI Summary/Chat Integration
description: Integrate OpenAI for meeting summary adjustment and AI chat about meetings.

title: Client Management
description: List, view, and manage clients in the dashboard.

title: Templates/Settings
description: Implement templates for emails/meetings and basic user/config settings.

title: Cloudflare Deployment
description: Deploy both frontend and backend to Cloudflare Pages and Workers.

title: Migrate backend from Cloudflare Workers to Node.js/Express on Render
description: Move backend to Render for better compatibility, update all environment variables, and ensure smooth deployment.

title: Supabase/Postgres integration for production backend
description: Connect backend to Supabase using transaction pooler, update DATABASE_URL, and create required tables.

title: Production Google OAuth and JWT troubleshooting
description: Debug and fix Google OAuth callback, JWT secret mismatches, and ensure secure login flow in production.

title: Implement /api/auth/verify endpoint for JWT validation
description: Add missing endpoint to backend for frontend to verify JWTs after login.

title: Sync past and future meetings from Google Calendar (START HERE)
description: [Current priority] Fetch both past and future meetings from the user's Google account and display them in the app. This is the foundation for all other features.

title: Save meetings to database
description: Persist all fetched meetings (past and future) from Google Calendar into the Postgres database.

title: Integrate ChatGPT for meeting summaries and chat
description: Embed ChatGPT in the app to process meeting summaries and provide AI chat about meetings.

title: CRUD for client records
description: Enable adding, editing, and saving data to client records in the app, with persistence to the database.

title: Instructions for best-practice ChatGPT integration
description: Document and implement the best way to integrate ChatGPT for processing meeting summaries and other AI features.

title: Database reliability and optimization
description: Ensure the database is robust, reliable, and optimized for all app features (meetings, clients, notes, etc.).

title: Fix Google OAuth scopes and implement per-user token management
description: Update OAuth scopes to include calendar access, implement per-user token storage and refresh, add reconnect functionality, and create comprehensive setup guide.
